root.title: restaur associ inc ra 4th qtr jan 3
root.body: shr 25 ct vs 36 ct net 1.4 mln vs 1.4 mln rev 56.9 mln vs 35.1 mln year shr 86 ct vs 75 ct net 4.7 mln vs 3.0 mln rev 201.4 mln vs 140.0 mln note:1985 4th qtr includ 99,000 loss carryforward share restat give effect 1.4 on stock split form 40 pct class dividend august 1985
